Land Mine walked to the Cr Tank and checked on Time Bomb.

"DrillBit, is the CR Tank broken? It's not working on..." She stopped. She
sliced her finger, just a tiny cut, and stuck it into the CR Tank. It
healed. She noticed Time Bomb hadn't healed any at all. She shook him around
and dropped him.

"DrillBit, whatever trick your playing, it won't work!" Land Mine said,
trying to act cool. She started crying and stepped away from Time Bomb
quickly...
----- Original Message -----
From: "RoboRick007" <rfa007@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, August 27, 2000 11:15 AM
Subject: Pred Base


> ::DrillBit::
>
> DrillBit dodged the missile, that AirBomber shot, before he leaft.
> "Damn you! We just gave you your life!" He yells, seeling of the door.
> He walked to Land Mine.
> "Ok, whatever. How about you go check on him, ok?" He asked.
> He didn't wait for a response, he walked over to KitKat.
> "Wanna go... you know?" He asked.
> "Wile we have a break in the war." He stated.
>
>
>
